creator: loks@webveda.com
text:
I just noticed that if in a html form there are multiple elements with the same 
name then the request.getParameter("elementname") is returning only the value 
of the element i tested the same servlet in JavaWebServer2.0 but there it is 
returning the the values all of the lements separated by " , "

When the parameter has more than one value, you must use
request.getParameterValues("elementname") to retrieve the multiple values.
creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
